faqs.response: The last date for paying any outstanding fees is October 30th. Please pay at the main accounts office or through the online student portal.
The Merit Scholarship application deadline is November 15th. Submit it at the student services portal.
The updated timetable is available on the university website's main page, under the 'Academics' section.
For unresolved queries, contact the Student Affairs Office at student.affairs@university.edu or call 555-123-4567.
A minimum of 75% attendance is required to be eligible for final exams. You can check your attendance status on the student portal.
The library is open from 9 AM to 8 PM. You can issue up to 4 books at a time. Online resources and journals are accessible 24/7 through the library website.
Hostel room applications for the next semester will open on December 1st. Please apply through the accommodation section of the student portal.
To request certificates like bonafide or transcripts, please fill out the form in the 'Requests' section of the student portal. It usually takes 3-5 working days.
